documents.title: Animations | SketchyBar
documents.summary: This document explains how to implement animations for SketchyBar properties, covering syntax, duration calculation, and techniques for chaining multiple animations.

documents.title: SketchyBar
documents.description: A highly customizable macOS statusbar replacement
documents.summary: This document provides an introduction to SketchyBar, a highly customizable macOS status bar replacement, including links to its features and installation setup.

documents.title: Bar Properties | SketchyBar
documents.summary: This document provides instructions on setting up and managing the SketchyBar configuration file and using the command line for real-time adjustments and debugging.

documents.title: Special Components | SketchyBar
documents.description: Components -- Special Items with special properties
documents.summary: This document details the specialized component types available in SketchyBar, providing instructions for adding and configuring graphs, spaces, brackets, aliases, and sliders.

documents.title: Events & Scripting | SketchyBar
documents.summary: This document explains the event-driven scripting system in SketchyBar, detailing how to subscribe to system events, create custom triggers, and utilize environment variables within scripts.

documents.title: Item Properties | SketchyBar
documents.summary: This document explains how to add and configure items in SketchyBar, providing a comprehensive list of properties for styling icons, labels, backgrounds, and scripting behaviors.

documents.title: Popup Menus | SketchyBar
documents.summary: This document explains how to configure and manage popup menus in SketchyBar, detailing available properties and how to associate sub-items with a parent menu.

documents.title: Querying Information | SketchyBar
documents.summary: This document explains how to retrieve configuration and state information from SketchyBar using various query commands that return JSON-formatted data. It covers querying the bar, specific items, defaults, events, and display configurations.

documents.title: Tips & Tricks | SketchyBar
documents.summary: This document provides guidance on optimizing and troubleshooting SketchyBar configurations, covering command batching, performance tuning, icon integration, and running multiple bar instances.

documents.description: If you wish to reload the configuration file of the bar without resorting to
documents.summary: This document explains how to manually reload SketchyBar configurations and how to enable the automatic hotload feature for real-time updates.

documents.title: Type Nomenclature | SketchyBar
documents.summary: This document defines the data types and value nomenclature used for configuration, providing details on boolean operations and ARGB hex color manipulations.

documents.title: Credits | SketchyBar
documents.summary: This document provides attribution and historical context for the software project, detailing its origins as a rewritten fork of spacebar inspired by yabai.

documents.title: Features | SketchyBar
documents.summary: This document introduces the core features and architectural components of SketchyBar, a highly customizable and scriptable status bar for macOS.

documents.title: Setup | SketchyBar
documents.summary: This document provides comprehensive instructions for installing, configuring, and uninstalling SketchyBar on macOS, including prerequisite settings and font setup.
